content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite satisfactory. Let's discuss the rental price. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Herr Schmidt. I appreciate your time. I would like to offer 750 Euro per month for the apartment. I believe this is a fair price considering the location and the amenities nearby.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 750 Euro is much lower than what I'm seeking for this prime location. The apartment's proximity to the city center and the amenities it offers make it quite valuable. I'm looking for a price closer to 1000 Euro per month. Is that something you would consider?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hmm, 1000 Euro per month is quite high for an unfurnished apartment. I would prefer to pay closer to 800 Euro per month. This would still be a fair reflection of the apartment's value.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 800 Euro is still not acceptable to me. The apartment's location and the recent construction make it a very desirable place to live. I'm looking for a tenant who is willing to pay its true value. I'm not willing to negotiate further on the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your stance, Herr Schmidt. However, as a student, I'm looking for a place that offers a good balance between quality and affordability. While I appreciate the apartment's location and amenities, 1000 Euro per month is out of my budget. I would like to continue negotiating to find a price that is more in line with what I can afford.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry to hear that, Max. As a landlord, I have to consider the best interest of my property. If you're unable to meet my asking price, I'm afraid we may not be able to reach an agreement. I'm open to negotiating, but I must stress that the price must reflect the value of the apartment. Is there anything else you would like to discuss?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Herr Schmidt. I appreciate your time and the opportunity to visit the apartment. While I would like to continue negotiating, I don't want to waste your time if we are not likely to agree on a price. I'll consider your offer and think about it. Thank you again.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your time, Max. If you decide to reconsider or if you have any other questions, please let me know. Good luck with your search for a new place. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
